response.overview: Growing up in post-World War II era Arizona, young Sammy Fabelman aspires to become a filmmaker as he reaches adolescence, but soon discovers a shattering family secret and explores how the power of films can help him see the truth.
response.title: The Fabelmans

titles.title: ザ・フェイブルマンズ

cast.name: Alex Quijano
cast.character: Grand View High School PE Coach
